original_text: God has raised you with Christ to a new life. So you should want more and more the things that belong to heaven. That is where Christ is now. He sits there at God's right side.
korean_text: 그러므로 너희가 그리스도와 함께 다시 살리심을 받았으면 위의 것을 찾으라 거기는 그리스도께서 하나님 우편에 앉아 계시느니라

sentences.original_text: God has raised you with Christ
So you should want more and more
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신은 점점 더 원해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: the things that belong to heaven
That is where Christ is now
He sits there at God's right side
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 하나님의 오른편에 거기 앉아 계십니다
